name: Zombsody 2D
description:
Zombsody is a 2D top-down shooter game in which you play as the survivor of a zombie apocalypse caused by poisonous gas that escaped from an underground laboratory that everyone calls "The Lab". Your goal is to kill all the zombies standing in your way, and get into The Lab where you'll need to stop the gas to stop spread of the virus. 

Another way to play Zombsody 2D is the arena mode, in which you are stuck on an island and infinite amount of zombies spawn all around it - kill as much as you can!

Credits: NostalgiaModder - Texture art, beta testing; SteleCat - Coming up with the name

Current development status: Zombsody is in early stage of development, with most of the features missing. In this Alpha version, you can only play the infinite arena mode.
